K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:415b-22: khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-5: bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' bas lus btang zhing //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-13: khyod ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dad par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-14: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-16: kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa na tsandan na gyi khang bzang gi nang na gser gyi khri la bzhag pa'i tshe lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'dong ba kho mos mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-17: de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-19: dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod pa kho mos thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-20: de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang nas gang gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig po de la lha'i bu rnams kyis dris pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-0: de ni ji ltar shes @416b par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-1: de nas lha'i bu des kho mo'i bsam pa shes nas lha'i bu de dag kyang dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-2: de yi dbu skra dri med snum zhing mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-3: gtsang 'jam g-yas su 'khyil ba'i lcang lo can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-4: zhal mdog padma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-5: zla nya mtshan mo nam mkhar mdzes pa bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-6: de yi mdzod spu kha ba shel mdog bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-7: smin mtshams par nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-8: de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-9: rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-10: mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-11: sems stobs mi zhum tshems mnyam thags kyang bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-12: de yi ljags che zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-13: de yi zhal ni dri med rnam par mdzes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-14: de yi gsung ni phan zhing snyan la ran //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-15: tshig rtsub spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-16: skye bo dpag tu med pa dad mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-17: 'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i gsung yang sgrogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-18: de yi mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-19: de bzhin mi dbang phyag gi sor mo ring //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-20: de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-21: brang yangs dri med lte ba gzhol zhing zab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-22: rta mchog lta bur 'doms kyi spa ba nub //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-23: de bzhin spu yi khong bu gser dang 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-24: brla yi dbyibs ni glang po'i lag dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:416b-25: zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa ae na'i 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-1: gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-2: ngan ltas bcom pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-3: 'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-4: 'khrul med skyon dang bral bas sems can kun tshim mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-5: gya gyur med drang tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-6: mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-7: skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-8: mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-9: de ni rang gis sangs rgyas gyur pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-10: bdag nyid brgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-11: 'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge shis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-12: 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-13: ston pa de yi yon tan 'di dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-14: gzhan yang mtha' yas kho bos deng ma brjod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-15: thos nas lha rnams yid dga' dad gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-16: rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang bsgom //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-17: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-19: kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-20: mngon par dran te de tshun tshad nam yang rmugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-21: gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417a-22: nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-0: @417b gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-1: 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-2: mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang pha la dga' ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-13: skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-15: gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su bran no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-18: gsum sems la yid la bya ba yid la byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-20: de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-21: kho mos don nam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang chud zos par ma byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-23: kho mos nyin mtshan gang du yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-25: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-27: kho mos ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:417b-29: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-0: de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i @418a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-1: lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-2: bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la lo rgyus 'di rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-4: de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings pa'i tshul du song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-5: ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-7: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas kyang ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-9: dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-10: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs nas bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-11: nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-12: de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tshe gus pa dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-14: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-17: bud med ni shes rab sor gnyis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-21: tshul bzhin du ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchis pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418a-22: bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-0: ci nas bdag @418b gi yun ring po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-1: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam 'byung ba 'di dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-2: bram ze'i tshig thos nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-3: des nyan thos de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-6: kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-7: gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-9: rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-10: yid bde ba la brtson nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-11: 'on tam 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis smra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-12: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-13: khyod kyi gzugs byad lha yi bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-14: rgyan rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-15: ji ltar khyod ni nam yang gnyid kyis mnon pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-16: ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-17: khyod kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-18: ma ni rtag tu khyod kyi dbang du gyur pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-19: bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-20: de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba rnyed ma 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-21: sdug cing phongs la yid du 'ong ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-22: skye bo kun la dga' ba bskyed yin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:418b-23: yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-0: ci yi phyir ni khyim 'dir dga' ba @419a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-2: bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-3: ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-4: yongs su nyams shing yid byung sems su gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-5: khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'dra nga la smos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-6: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-7: yab gcig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-8: khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chud dam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-9: 'khor ba'i gnas ni gar la blta dang mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-10: 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig pa can //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-11: sprul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-12: gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-13: khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sprul bzhi ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-14: srid pa sems pa bde ba ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-15: mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-16: dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-17: kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-18: ji ltar bde 'thob rgyal po bka' stsol cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-19: dug 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-20: gsad sar bkri la dga' ba ga la mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-21: g-yang sa che 'dir su zhig yid rton bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-22: rgyal po 'tsho ba 'jig rten de dag mtshungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-23: blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-24: ri rab tsam gyis phung por gyur to zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-25: de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419a-26: 'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-0: @419b pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-1: bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshogs 'gro ba kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-2: 'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs brnyan 'dra //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-3: 'di 'dra'i mi sdug gang la su yid rton //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-4: gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-5: de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang bskyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-6: byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-7: yab gcig bdag gis ma mthong ma thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-8: bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba blta 'tshal gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-9: bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-10: rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sras po 'di dag mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-11: yab gcig ji ltar 'dod pa bsten par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-12: de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-13: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha cang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-14: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-15: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus pa thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-16: 'di ltar btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-17: ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:419b-19: de gal te 'dus byas lags na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni rdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no zhes bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-0: ji ste 'dus ma byas lags nas 'dus ma @420a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-1: byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-2: gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa moo 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-6: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-9: bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-10: de ni lan gdab par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-11: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa moo 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-12: 'di ltar btsun pa moo 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-13: ci tshe dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-14: 'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-15: gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na sems can ni ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-16: de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420a-17: ji ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-0: 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na rnam par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu @420b 'phrul 'byor par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-1: tshe dang ldan pa moo 'gal gyi bu chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-2: de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa moo 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-4: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-5: moo 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-7: bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-8: 'gyur ba med pa dang rnam par rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-9: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-10: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-11: ci tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-12: 'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-13: gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-14: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-15: byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-16: de lta bas na btsun pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:420b-17: ji ltar dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston na ni chos smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te de ni mi 'thad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po yang cang mi smra bar @421a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-4: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-5: tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-6: bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri yi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-7: bu mos ni don dam pa dris te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-8: de la ni lan gdab par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-9: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-10: 'di ltar btsun pa 'od srung chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing gang dag las tha na gzar bu gang tsam gyis bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-11: de ci btsun pa'i lus kyis sbyin pa sbyong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-12: 'on te sems kyis sbyin pa sbyong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-13: gal te lus kyis sbyong na lus ni bems po g-yo ba ma mchis pa byed pa ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-14: rtsva dang shing dang rtsig pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs pas des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so; ;ji ste sems kyis sbyong na sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-15: des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-16: ji ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis sbyong na de ni ma mchis pa ste ma mchis pas ji ltar sbyong bar bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421a-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mos dris @421b pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-2: bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-3: bu mos ni len pa med pa dris shing yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dri bas de'i lan gdab par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-4: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-5: 'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyis mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-6: ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-7: 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-8: gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-9: ji ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags na ni chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-10: 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-11: skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-12: mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-13: de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-14: 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-15: tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-17: bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:421b-18: dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni ma byung ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-0: @422a *// ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-2: de nas tshe dang dang ldan pa nam grus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-4: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-6: 'di la brjod du ci yang med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-7: cang mi smra ba de 'thob byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-8: spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-9: bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-10: ji srid dngos po skye yod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-11: de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-12: chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-13: 'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-14: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-15: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-16: ci sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-17: 'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-18: gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing sgyu ma lta bu ste yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422a-19: ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-0: ji ste sems ma mchis pa gnas te bsam @422b gtan mdzad na ni rtsva dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-3: rdo la sogs pa byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-4: zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-6: 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-7: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-9: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-10: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-12: bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dri ste de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so; ;bu mos smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-13: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-14: nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-15: gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-16: de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-17: de bas na de bzhin nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-18: gnyis ni bye brag ma mchis na ci'i slad du tshe dang ldan pa nam gru de skad ces gsung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-19: nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-20: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-21: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-22: ci lha'i mig gis dngos po gzigs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:422b-23: 'on te dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-1: dngos po gzigs na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-2: ji ste dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te de yang mi rigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-3: ma 'gags pa yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-5: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-6: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-7: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-8: bu mos ni shes rab kun tu 'joms pas dris pas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-9: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-10: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na; ci mang du thos pa nyid de don du lta'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-12: gal te don du lta na don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-13: rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423a-14: ji ste tshig 'brur lta na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-0: de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du @423b thos pa ni rton pa ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-2: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-4: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-6: bu mo ni yi ge dang bral ba 'dri ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-7: de ni sgras tshim par byed mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-8: bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste slob pa rnams kyis ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-9: de ji ltar bstan par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-10: chos kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-11: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-12: 'jam dpal khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-13: ci rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab bam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-14: 'on te ngo bo nyid zab pas zab /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-15: gal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab na ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:423b-17: 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-0: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes @424a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-1: par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis su ma mchis la kun du 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-2: ji ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab na ni ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-4: bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pas kho bo zab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-5: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-7: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-8: de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal ba ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-11: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni dmigs su med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-12: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-14: dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gi tshig bla dvags kyang ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-15: dmigs su ma mchis pa ni tshig bla dvags las yang dag par 'das pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-18: 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-22: de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-24: yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-25: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424a-26: rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-0: bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de @424b dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-1: ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mthong ba mdzad dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-2: 'on tam chos kyi skur mthong ba mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-3: gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong ba mdzad na de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-5: gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-6: gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-8: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-10: ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na chos kyi sku ni bstan du mi nus pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-11: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa de blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o; ;mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gi smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-15: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-16: mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa; bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste de ni bstan par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-17: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-18: bdag ni dngos po'am dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-19: bstan pa slobs la de nas ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-20: mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:424b-21: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-1: skad du gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po che gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-3: ci zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs par mdzad dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-4: 'on te zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-5: gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-7: 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-8: ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs pa mdzad na zan gzing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-9: rin po che tog kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-10: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-11: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-12: tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung du myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsdam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-13: de ni khyod kyis bsam par mi spyod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425a-14: gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425b-0: ji ste bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong @425b bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung du myong bar ji ltar mdzad de bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag po rnyed par 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:425b-9: ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426a-11: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426a-12: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-1: ji ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis pa lags na ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-2: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar bsgrub pa ma mchis so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-6: bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-7: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-8: bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-10: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-12: gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-13: 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-14: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-16: gang na skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni yi ge 'jug pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-19: yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-21: chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-22: de la ni rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:426b-23: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-0: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs @427a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-1: pa brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-3: spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-4: ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-5: 'on te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-7: de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-8: ji ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-14: sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam gdab pa'i sems bskyed pa ste mchis sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-16: gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427a-17: ji ste ma mchis na chad par lta ba lags te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-4: ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-5: 'on te ma mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-7: ji ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-8: byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-10: byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-11: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-12: ci ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba lags sam; 'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:427b-16: gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o zhe'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-2: sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-3: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-4: byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-5: mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-11: der bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa 'di ni mkhas pa'i zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-15: gang na gdeg pa med pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:428a-23: bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:429b-0: rtag tu bya @429b dang mtshungs shing zla ba 'dra //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-3: chos smra ba la 'thab mo yong mi rgol //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-21: 'jig rten kun dang mi mthun pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-22: skye ba med par rab tu sgrogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-23: mchog tu dga' ba rnyed gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-24: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-25: lus dang srog la mi lta bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-26: de ni byang chub lta bar byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435a-27: bzhi po 'di dag bstan byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-0: lha dang bcas @435b pa'i 'jig rten kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-1: sna tshogs phreng 'dras tshim par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-3: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-7: sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-10: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob bo //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-16: chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-17: myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-29: skye bo mi mthun pa dag 'dum par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:435b-30: lung nod kha ton byed la yang dag 'dzud //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436a-1: bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436a-9: lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su tshol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436a-11: tha na sems dang po bskyed pa na byang chub sems dpa' la yang bsti stang byed pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'di skad ces @436b gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-2: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par mi bgyis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-3: bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tsho zhing zhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-5: bu mo khyod 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' ba mi shes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-7: de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-8: btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-9: bden pa'i tshig gang dag gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-10: ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-11: ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-12: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:436b-13: sems can gang la yang gnod pa med par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-0: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di @437a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-1: dag yongs su yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-2: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngon par bab par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-3: ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-4: bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te skyes pa'i lus su red cing lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-5: smon lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di byas ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-6: ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong gi sgra yang byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-7: lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-8: bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa yang bud med kyis lus mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon nu 'dra bar snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar che ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-13: dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-14: byang chub kyi snying po gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-0: 'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di @437b ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-1: 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-5: ji skad smra pa bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-6: dang por sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-7: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang sbyin gnas yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-9: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-11: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-12: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-18: shel dang; dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-19: 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te; slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-20: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:437b-21: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-0: lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi @438a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-1: mjed bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dbyangs ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-2: mgon po lha sgra yid 'ong ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-3: gti mug spong pa 'jig rten dag na dga' ba bzang po gzhal yas bskyed mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-4: stobs bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gi don du 'od btang bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-5: rir bcas nags tshal bcas shing chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g-yos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-6: lha rnams nam mkhar gnas shing lha yi me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-7: seng ges wa pham bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-8: dpa' bo gang gi don du 'od kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-9: nyi zla bye ba stong gi 'od bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang; ;lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin dag gi 'od rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-10: sh'akya thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-015:438a-11: 'od rnams thams cad mog mog por bgyis sangs rgyas 'od na phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes //
